tool.name: msPurity.purityX
tool.description: Calculate the anticipated precursor ion purity from a LC-MS XCMS dataset.
tool.command:
Rscript '$__tool_directory__/purityX.R' --xset_path='$xset' --out_dir='.' --minOffset=$minoffset --maxOffset=$maxoffset --singleFile=$singleFile --purityType=$purityType --cores=\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} #if $xgroups.xgroups == "choose" --xgroups='$xgroups.xgroups_value' #end if --camera_xcms=$camera_xcms #if $camera_xcms == "camera" --rdata_name=xa #else --rdata_name=xset #end if --iwNorm=$iw_norm --ilim=$ilim #if $isotopes.isotopes == "exclude_default" --exclude_isotopes #elif $isotopes.isotopes == "user" --exclude_isotopes --isotope_matrix='$isotopes.im' #end if #if $file_load_conditional.file_load_select == 'yes' --galaxy_files=' #for $i in $file_load_conditional.input $i, #end for ' #end if #if $file_load_conditional.file_load_select == 'yes' --files=' #for $i in $file_load_conditional.input $i.name, #end for ' #end if
#if $choose_class_cond.choose_class== 'choose' --choose_class=$choose_class_cond.class #end if #if $ignore_files_cond.ignore_files_choice== 'choose' --ignore_files=$ignore_files_cond.ignore_files #end if
#if $raw_rt_columns --rtraw_columns #end if

param.help: xcmsSet object saved as an RData file

param.label: singleFile
param.help: If just a single file for purity is to be calculated (rather than the grouped XCMS peaks). Uses the index of the files in xcmsSet object. If zero this is ignored

param.name: choose_class
param.label: Choose class of XCMS set object to perform calculation on?
Choose class
param.help: Comma separated string of classes (found in the phenoData slot of xcmsSet object i.e. xset@phenoData). An average will across all the choosen classes.

param.name: ignore_files_choice
param.label: Ignore files?
param.option: Choose files to ignore from calculation
Include all files of selected classes in calculation

param.label: ignore files
param.help: Comma separated string of filenames to ignore (do not include the directory) eg. blank1.mzML,blank2.mzML,sample4.mzML

param.name: xgroups
param.label: xgroups
param.option: Choose XCMS grouped features to calculate precursor ion purity
Calculate precursor ion purity for all XCMS grouped features

param.name: xgroups_value
param.label: xgroup ids
param.help: Comma separated string of xcms groups to perform prediction on eg. 1,2,3,4

param.label: Method of averaging purity
param.help: Area and average used for the purity predictions. FWHM='Full width half maximum', FW='Full width'

param.label: Has the raw retention time been tracked within the peaks?
param.help: Only applicable when using retention time correction with obiwarp. When obiwarp is used the retention time correction tracking is slightly different to the other correction methods. To ensure correct tracking with obiwarp an additional tool (track_rt_raw) should be performed prior to any retention time correction.
